text: Nasrudin met on the street with a con man. I was told you were dead and buried! "The mule exclaimed. "As you can see, I am alive and in perfect condition", the other replied. "Don't think I'm going to fall into that trap", Nasrudin said. If you say you're alive, you're probably dead. We all know how cheating you are! FIN
title: El embustero honesto
author: nan Anónimo
